title: Bags, Pillows, and Pincushions: 35 Quick and Easy Projects (Better Homes and Gardens Crafts)
features: Sew fresh, stylish bags, pillows, and pincushions

Bags, pillows, and pincushions are among the most popular projects for sewers and quilters. And it's no wonder-creating accessories and accents is a fast, approachable endeavor when you're itching to sew but don't have the time to tackle larger projects.
gives you a fresh, robust collection of sewing patterns from the editors of

-5 of which are all-new projects, specially selected by your favorite editors. From approachable first projects to clever ideas for using scraps, you'll get step-by-step instructions for making beautiful bags to punch up your wardrobe, pillows to instantly update any dŽcor, and pincushions worthy of treasured gift status.
45 patterns for stylish bags, pillows, and pincushions

description: You'll love these cutest-ever bags, pillows, and pincushions! Enjoy 35 of our editors' favorite purses and totes, adorable pillows, and sweet pincushions. Full-size patterns and quilting basics provide all the how-to you need to make these fabric treasures and gifts.
Favorites from the Editors of AMERICAN PATCHWORK & QUILTING

The iconic BETTER HOMES AND GARDENS brand is one of America's most trusted sources for information on cooking, gardening, home improvement, home design, decorating, and crafting. Today, the brand encompasses books, magazines, and digital media.
